full_threads.body:
Hi Lizzy,


Ok thanks for letting me know, we will do what we can and wait for the final content etc.


Enjoy your holiday… hopefully you are either off to the snow or somewhere fabulously warm!


Thanks and speak soon,

Heath Maguire
Director

E. heath@wpperk.com | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

https://wpperk.com/email-sig/wpperk-email-logo.png


Begin forwarded message:


From: Admin <admin@msra.org.au>

Subject: RE: MSRA Event Webpage

Date: 15 June 2018 at 4:39:56 pm AEST

To: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au>

Cc: Petricia Augustus <paugustus@msra.org.au>


Hi Heath,

I just wanted to let you know that I’m going to be out of the office for 3 weeks on holiday so Trish will be picking some of this back up in my absence (it’s a bit of a relay getting this project done!)

Are you ok to get going on the two registration pages? I’ve attached a brief these can be based on (similar to last year). We also need to arrange:

· Automated emails for post-registration (one for each registration stream – Live Stream to give details of the URL, Studio Audience to give details of the venue, access, registration info)

· Live Stream URL page (where the live stream can be embedded)

Thank you again for all your help with this and any questions on the detail, Trish will be able to clarify for you.

Have a lovely weekend.

Thanks

Lizzy

From: Admin
Sent: Wednesday, 13 June 2018 11:09 AM
To: 'Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ' <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Cc: Petricia Augustus <paugustus@msra.org.au>
Subject: RE: MSRA Event Webpage

Hi Heath,

Looks great at first glance. I’m just going through this updated version now to hopefully fill in the last bits of missing content for you so will send this to you later today. I’ll also send you the content for the two registration pages that need to be built so you can get going on those too.

Meanwhile, when you have a moment please could you send me:

· The HEX values for the orange and the blue to ensure the email invitation I’m drafting up follows the same colourway as the website.

· The email banner (size is 560x452) and doesn’t need the MS Research Australia logo incorporated into it as I will have this sitting separately at the top of the email (just needs to have the image and the ‘PROGRESS IN MS RESEARCH LIVE UPDATE 2018’ title).

Thanks

Lizzy

From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ [mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au]
Sent: Tuesday, 12 June 2018 4:34 PM
To: Admin <admin@msra.org.au>
Cc: Petricia Augustus <paugustus@msra.org.au>
Subject: Re: MSRA Event Webpage

Hi Lizzy,

Sure, we have quickly made those changes for you: https://msra.org.au/progress-ms-research-live-update-2018

Let me know what you think? Thanks,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

https://wolfiq.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/wolfiq-wpperk-signature-2018.png

On 12 Jun 2018, at 3:58 pm, Admin <admin@msra.org.au> wrote:

Hi Heath,

I’ve now had time to look at this properly and I really like direction it’s going in. The brightness of the image looks great and I agree that this would translate nicely onto the PPT template. I also like the ‘wireless’ symbol with the event name lock-up (we just need to be sure we use the Helvetica font for this).

Please see our feedback below and attached. Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.

General feedback:

· Please can we add ‘2018’ to the end of the title wherever it is mentioned, so it would read: PROGRESS IN MS RESEARCH LIVE UPDATE 2018

Webpage feedback:

· On the web banner, could the image background extend out to the far left so that the event text sits over the image background (similar to what you’ve done with the social image)

· Move the ‘register your attendance today’ buttons to the top of the page (to sit just below the ‘When, Where, etc’ banner)

· I’ve compiled the content that can be dropped into this page on the attached word doc

· I’ve also attached the speaker photos so these can also be dropped into the page

Look forward to hearing from you and thanks again for turning this round so quickly for us.

Many thanks

Lizzy

From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ [mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au]
Sent: Monday, 11 June 2018 3:32 PM
To: Admin <admin@msra.org.au>
Cc: Petricia Augustus <paugustus@msra.org.au>
Subject: Re: MSRA Event Webpage

Hi Lizzy,

We have made a head start on this over the weekend given the time constraints.

Here is a link to the draft event page: https://msra.org.au/progress-ms-research-live-update-2018/

And I have attached an example of the social post to match.

We have created more of an event brand this year… a logo of sorts. I think it will give it some visual edge on last year and incorporates a ‘live streaming’ visual cue as well. The colours used in the image are also purposefully selected to be ‘bright’ and to stand out in the humdrum of peoples social feeds. I think the yellows/oranges with the red MS Research Australia logo in close proximity will catch the eye of our regular followers.

It will also look great as your powerpoint holding slides etc.

The content is all obviously holding copy for now. Also once we have the event registration copy, we will create the streaming and live audience registration pages.

Let me know your thoughts?

Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

https://wolfiq.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/wolfiq-wpperk-signature-2018.png

<image001.jpg>

On 8 Jun 2018, at 5:39 pm, Admin <admin@msra.org.au> wrote:

Hi Heath,

Thank you so much and I completely understand it is a bit tight.

We’re basically trying to get as much of this event planning/comms signed off by the end of next week as I’m away on holiday and won’t be around to assist Trish with it for a couple of weeks.

All your help is greatly appreciated.

Have a great long weekend.

Many thanks

Lizzy

From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ [mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au]
Sent: Friday, 8 June 2018 5:34 PM
To: Admin <admin@msra.org.au>
Cc: Petricia Augustus <paugustus@msra.org.au>
Subject: Re: MSRA Event Webpage

Hi Lizzy,

Thanks for your email and nice to e-meet you too.

Sure, we will do our best.

As it’s a public holiday on Monday, we will really only have Tuesday to complete this task. So just setting a realistic expectation that it’s going to be tight. I have pencilled this in to be the first on Tuesday, so all being well we will have it to you by COB Tuesday and yes I will call you if anything is unclear.

Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

https://wolfiq.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/wolfiq-wpperk-signature-2018.png

On 8 Jun 2018, at 5:31 pm, Admin <admin@msra.org.au> wrote:

Hi Heath,

Following on from my email below, please see the brief attached that I outlined below.

Let me know if anything is unclear or you need more info. Happy to catch up on a call on Tuesday morning if you’d like to discuss this further.

Look forward to hearing from you.

Have a lovely weekend.

Thanks

Lizzy

From: Admin
Sent: Friday, 8 June 2018 11:33 AM
To: 'heath@wolfiq.com.au' <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Cc: Petricia Augustus <paugustus@msra.org.au>
Subject: MSRA Event Webpage

Hi Heath,

I wanted to say hi and to e-meet you as I’m picking up some work for Trish (some of what Ange used to do).

I’m looking specifically at a Live Update event we are holding on the 28th August (a similar event was held in October 2017). I’m currently putting together a brief for you which I’ll be able to share later this afternoon but I wanted to give you a heads up as we will need to move rather quickly on this.

A rough guide as to what I’ll need:

· a couple of pages on the msra site including a registration function/form (using a similar template to last years’ event pages – URL here for reference: https://msra.org.au/event/progress-ms-research-conference-2017/ )

· a small graphic design job to create the branding for the event (including the web banner in a couple of different sizes for use also on email marketing and social)

Once I’ve sent it through I’m more than happy to chat my more detailed brief through on the phone later today if you’re available.

Ideally we would need a first draft of the branding by close of business Tuesday and the web pages by midday Wednesday.

Many thanks in advance

<image001.jpg>

Lizzy Morton

Administration Assistant

MS Research Australia

02 8413 7900 • 1300 356 467

admin@msra.org.au • www.msra.org.au

Level 19 Northpoint • 100 Miller Street • North Sydney NSW 2060

<image002.gif><image003.gif><image004.gif><image005.gif><image006.png><image007.png><image008.png>

<image009.jpg>

This email message and any accompanying attachments may contain information that is confidential and is subject to legal privilege. If you are not the intended recipient, do not read, use, disseminate, distribute or copy this message or attachments. If you have received this message in error, please notify the sender immediately and delete this message. Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender, except where the sender expressly, and with authority, states them to be the views of MS Research Australia. Before opening any attachments, please check them for viruses and defects.

<WEB BRIEF - LIVE UPDATE 2018.docx>
